int predictbb (float *bb0, CvPoint2D32f *pt0, CvPoint2D32f *pt1, int nPts, float *bb1, float *shift)

Function Documentation

int predictbb ( float *  bb0,
CvPoint2D32f *  pt0,
CvPoint2D32f *  pt1,
int  nPts,
float *  bb1,
float *  shift 
)
Parameters:
bb0 The previous BoundingBox.
pt0 Feature points in the previous BoundingBox.
pt1 Feature points of the new BoundingBox.
nPts Length of pt0/pt1.
bb1 Output, contains predicted BoundingBox.
shift Output, contains relative scale change. 1 == no scalechange, experience: if shift == 0 BoundingBox moved completely out of picture (not validated)

Calculates the new (moved and resized) Bounding box. Calculation based on all relative distance changes of all points to every point. Then the Median of the relative Values is used.
